metadata.title: Par rapport à la vancomycine, le linézolide améliore la guérison et la survie des patients atteints de pneumonies nosocomiales à Staphylococcus aureus méthicilline-résistant (SAMR) Epidemiological determinants of spread of causal agent of severe acute respiratory syndrome in

abstract.original_text: Wunderink RG, Rello J, Cammarata SK, Croos-Dabrera RV, Kollef MH. Linezolid vs vancomycin: analysis of two doubleblind studies of patients with methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus nosocomial pneumonia.

sentences.segment_text: Cammarata SK , Croos-Dabrera RV , Kollef MH .
Linezolid vs vancomycin : analysis of two doubleblind studies of patients with methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus nosocomial pneumonia .
